title: Jay Z’s 99 Problems Include Suing his Photographer-Friend
description:
Jay Z is one of the world’s greatest rappers, a master at business, and married to the queen of music, Beyonce.  While this may be intimidating to most, his former photographer and friend, Jonathan Mannion, doesn’t seem to care since he's been selling Jay Z photos for profit (allegedly) without permission.  And now Jay Z is suing him.  Tune in as we break it all down!  

Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/legallyjudgy/?hl=en
Twitter: https://twitter.com/LegallyJudgy
